titles.title: Government Patent Policy Amendments of 1987

A bill to amend title 35 of the United States Code to extend to all contractors, assignees, and exclusive licensees under Federal funding agreements the current requirement that the manufacturing of products through the use of inventions that are the subject of patents arising from federally supported research and development be significantly performed in the United States.
